# buffer

**Instance Property**

A Metal buffer that contains a list of vectors.

## Declaration

```swift
var buffer: any MTLBuffer { get }
```

## Discussion

Each vector in the buffer is of the type defined by [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARGeometrySource/format]. Every vector may itself contain multiple scalars, defined by [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARGeometrySource/componentsPerVector].

The buffer’s [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Metal/MTLResource/storageMode] is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Metal/MTLStorageMode/shared] which allows it to be accessed on both, the CPU, and GPU.

## Accessing Geometry

- **subscript(_:)**: Provides the source float triplet at the subscripted index.
- **subscript(_:)**: Provides the number at the subscripted index.
